laboratory_examinations.findings: Maximum intima-media thickness was 1.3 mm on the right and 1.2 mm on the left (normal <1.1 mm)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Showed nearly unchanged findings at age 33, but at age 36 the maximum thickness was 0.6 mm on the right and 0.9 mm on the left (normal). Thickness decreased when lipoprotein apheresis volume increased to 4.0 L per session once per week.
